tooltip.electricity.wire: Connect two insulators to run a line.
tooltip.electricity.power_wrench: Right click a device to view more information.
tooltip.electricity.utility_pole: Supports up to eight live insulators.
tooltip.electricity.electric_cabin: One insulator is the input, the other feeds the grid.
tooltip.electricity.power_box: Converts turbine output into FE and powers nearby Electricity API devices.
tooltip.electricity.wind_turbine: Makes about 80 kW at perfect wind and tracks the simulated weather.
tooltip.electricity.electric_lamp: Grid lamp that brightens or dims with network health.
tooltip.electricity.workbench: The only table that crafts Electricity components.
tooltip.electricity.circuit_board: Printed board used in every controller.
tooltip.electricity.cpu: Simple control unit for Electricity builds.
tooltip.electricity.insulator: Ceramic insulator used for attaching wires to a device.
tooltip.electricity.metal_casing: Sheet metal body for boxes and nacelles.
tooltip.electricity.motor_core: Rotor coil for the turbine head and other powered parts.
screen.electricity.power_info.title: Power Diagnostics
message.electricity.wire.failed_insulato: Failed to resolve one of the insulators.
message.electricity.wire.too_far: Those insulators are too far apart (%s m > %s m).
message.electricity.wire.anchor_unavaila: That device is still initializing; try again in a moment.
